original: @325b / /rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @325b / /rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: bidy'a dha ri n'i badzra yo gi n'i s'a dha na n'a ma /
analyzed: bidy'a dha ri n'i badzra yo gi n'i s'a dha na n'a ma /
translated: Vidya-dharini-vajra-yogini-sadhana-nama

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rig pa 'dzin pa rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rig pa 'dzin pa rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
translated: Vajrayoginisadhana of the vidyadhara

original: de nas yang dag bshad bya ste /
analyzed: de nas yang dag bshad bya ste /
translated: Then, I will explain

original: 'bum phrag gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen mo ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rgyud las sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'bum phrag gsum pa las 'byung ba'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen mo ral pa gyen du brdzes pa'i rgyud las sgyu ma chen mo zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The great illusion net that arises from the three hundred thousand, the tantra of the great illusion called the great raised hair,

original: snying gnas spros pas rmi lam lta bu'i lus dang / longs spyod dam pa'i bde ba gnyis su med par gyur pa dang / 'dir de'i steng du ma ning gi sa bon blta ste /
analyzed: snying gnas spros pas rmi lam lta bu'i lus dang / longs spyod dam pa'i bde ba gnyis su med par gyur pa dang / 'dir de'i steng du ma ning gi sa bon blta ste /
translated: The body like a dream arises from the emanation of the heart center, and the enjoyment of the two types of bliss become nondual.🔽Here, in addition to that, the seed syllable of the neuter is seen.

original: sa bon de yongs su gyur pa las dmar mo zhal steng du phyogs shing gyen du gzigs par /
analyzed: sa bon de yongs su gyur pa las dmar mo zhal steng du phyogs shing gyen du gzigs par /
translated: From the complete transformation of that seed syllable, red, facing upward, looking upward,

original: zhabs g-yon pa la 'khyud pa'i thod pa'i phreng ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba bcings pa'i phyag can ma /
analyzed: zhabs g-yon pa la 'khyud pa'i thod pa'i phreng ba dang / me tog gi phreng ba bcings pa'i phyag can ma /
translated: embracing the left foot, with a garland of skulls and a garland of flowers.

original: me tog gi zhags pa g-yon pa'i phyag na'o //
analyzed: me tog gi zhags pa g-yon pa'i phyag na'o //
translated: A garland of flowers in the left.

original: zhabs g-yas pa'i rting pa la reg pa'i g-yas pa na rdo rje'i @326a *//
analyzed: zhabs g-yas pa'i rting pa la reg pa'i g-yas pa na rdo rje'i @326a *//
translated: Touching the sole of the right foot with the right hand, holding a vajra,

original: phyag can ma rgyan thams cad spangs pa ma //
analyzed: phyag can ma rgyan thams cad spangs pa ma //
translated: She is free of all ornaments.

original: rig pa 'dzin ma'i rig pa'i sbyor ba can mo //
analyzed: rig pa 'dzin ma'i rig pa'i sbyor ba can mo //
translated: She is a knowledge-woman, engaged in the practice of knowledge.

original: spro zhing kun tu sdud pa'i lus can ma //
analyzed: spro zhing kun tu sdud pa'i lus can ma //
translated: She has a body that expands and contracts.

original: mand'a ra ba dang / mya ngan med pa dang / yongs 'du rnams skyes par gyur pa'i rin po che brtsegs pa'i khang par rab tu 'jug par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //🔽aom bam rdo rje phag ma'o //
analyzed: mand'a ra ba dang / mya ngan med pa dang / yongs 'du rnams skyes par gyur pa'i rin po che brtsegs pa'i khang par rab tu 'jug par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o // aom bam rdo rje phag ma'o //
translated: One should visualize oneself entering the jeweled mansion where the coral tree, the aśoka tree, and the pārijāta tree have arisen.🔽Oṃ vaṃ is Vajravārāhī.

original: ham yom sngon mo gshin rje ma'o //
analyzed: ham yom sngon mo gshin rje ma'o //
translated: Haṃ yoṃ is blue Yamī.

original: hrim mom rmongs byed ma'o //🔽hrem hr'im kun tu bskyod ma'o //
analyzed: hrim mom rmongs byed ma'o // hrem hr'im kun tu bskyod ma'o //
translated: Hriṃ moṃ is Moharā.🔽Hreṃ hrauṃ is Saṃkṣobhaṇī.

original: h'um h'um kun tu skrag byed ma'o //
analyzed: h'um h'um kun tu skrag byed ma'o //
translated: Huṃ huṃ is Saṃtrāsaṇī.

original: phat phat gtum mo yan lag thams cad la mtshan ma'o //
analyzed: phat phat gtum mo yan lag thams cad la mtshan ma'o //
translated: Phaṭ phaṭ is Caṇḍālī, the sign on all limbs.

original: lte ba dang / snying ga dang / de bzhin du kha dang / mgo bo dang / spyi bo ste 'di mtshon bya'o //
analyzed: lte ba dang / snying ga dang / de bzhin du kha dang / mgo bo dang / spyi bo ste 'di mtshon bya'o //
translated: navel, heart, and likewise mouth, head, and crown.

original: rnal 'byor ma lnga po 'di rnams rdo rje sems dpar bshad do //
analyzed: rnal 'byor ma lnga po 'di rnams rdo rje sems dpar bshad do //
translated: These five yoginīs are explained to be Vajrasattva.

original: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i go cha bgos la rang bzhin gyis bskyed pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i go cha bgos la rang bzhin gyis bskyed pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
translated: Having put on the armor of Vajraḍāka, one should give the natural-born bali.

original: aom shr'i he ru ka mah'a badzra a'a ka ddha ya a'a kaddha ya /
analyzed: aom shr'i he ru ka mah'a badzra a'a ka ddha ya a'a kaddha ya /
translated: Oṃ śrī heruka mahāvajra ākaṭhaya ākaṭhaya

original: pra be sha ya pra be sha ya /
analyzed: pra be sha ya pra be sha ya /
translated: praveśaya praveśaya

original: to sha ya to sha ya /
analyzed: to sha ya to sha ya /
translated: toṣaya toṣaya

original: sarba d'a ki n'i n'am hri da yam h'um phat/
analyzed: sarba d'a ki n'i n'am hri da yam h'um phat/
translated: sarvadākinīhṛdayaṃ hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom sarba bud dha d'a ki n'i pra t'itstshe mam ba lim h'um aom/🔽aom badzra d'a ki n'i pra t'itstshe mam ba lim h'um h'um/
analyzed: aom sarba bud dha d'a ki n'i pra t'itstshe mam ba lim h'um aom/ aom badzra d'a ki n'i pra t'itstshe mam ba lim h'um h'um/
translated: Oṃ sarvabuddhadākinīpāṭacchemabaliṃ huṃ oṃ.🔽Oṃ vajra-dākinīpāṭacchemabaliṃ huṃ huṃ.

original: aom ratna d'a ki n'i pra t'i tstshe mam ba lim h'um tr'am/
analyzed: aom ratna d'a ki n'i pra t'i tstshe mam ba lim h'um tr'am/
translated: Oṃ ratna-dākinīpāṭacchemabaliṃ huṃ traṃ.

original: aom padma d'a ki n'i pra t'itstshe mam ba lim h'um hr'i:/
analyzed: aom padma d'a ki n'i pra t'itstshe mam ba lim h'um hr'i:/
translated: Oṃ padma-dākinīpāṭacchemabaliṃ huṃ hrīḥ.

original: aom bi shva d'a ki n'i pra t'itstshe mam ba lim h'um a'a:aom sarba yo gi n'i pra t'itstshe mam ba lim h'um h'um/
analyzed: aom bi shva d'a ki n'i pra t'itstshe mam ba lim h'um a'a:aom sarba yo gi n'i pra t'itstshe mam ba lim h'um h'um/
translated: Oṃ sarva-yoginī prāṭicche mama baliṃ hūṃ hūṃ.

original: ha ha hi hi badzra dza:h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: ha ha hi hi badzra dza:h'um bam ho:/
translated: Ha ha hi hi vajra jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: aom badzra yo gi n'i sa ma ya stv'am dri shya raksha raksha ho:/
analyzed: aom badzra yo gi n'i sa ma ya stv'am dri shya raksha raksha ho:/
translated: Oṃ vajra-yoginī samaya stvaṃ dṛśya rakṣa rakṣa hoḥ.

original: rig pa 'dzin ma'i rdo rje rnal @326b 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so ////
analyzed: rig pa 'dzin ma'i rdo rje rnal @326b 'byor ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so ////
translated: The sādhana of Vajrayoginī, the awareness holder, is complete.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dz'a ya se na'i zhabs dang / lotstsha ba btsun pa dharma yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o ////
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dz'a ya se na'i zhabs dang / lotstsha ba btsun pa dharma yon tan gyis bsgyur ba'o ////
translated: The great Indian master Jāyaseṃa and the Tibetan translator, the monk Dharma Yönten, translated this.
